title: Pray in Salafi Masjid for their aqeedah /barelvi masjid for their better recitation? assim al hakeem
transcript: I have a problem on Fridays so I go to the S Masid for the five daily prayers but on Fridays they have a different IM for and prayer who does not pronounce the Quran correctly so the bar m in my area said the Quran correctly but have strange beliefs and sometimes announce weas after the prayer should I favor the Sal mid for their or should I go to the m no you should go to the Sala Masid you must not pray in a we Masid
